title: Notice
content:
wffweb-3.0.19 is released, it will provide better performance in multi-threading environment, upgrade your project now. Say good bye to anonymous style coding. Now you can use functional style coding instead of anonymous style coding.
wffweb-3.0.19 will be the last version in wffweb-3.x.x series.

wffweb-12 is under development, its beta version will be released soon, Java 17 is the minimum supported version for this.
